message.content:
{"id": "13620", "title": "The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has excessive white space", "description": "", "OB": "On the Java Source Attachment Preference Page, there is a label positioned in the middle of the page with a large amount of white space. The vertical alignment of this label should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.", "EB": "", "SR": "To reproduce the issue: 

1. Load a project from the repository.
2. Select a source folder.
3. Open Properties.
4. Select Java Source Attachment.
5. [Add further details here.]

Expected behavior:

The label should not have excessive white space and its vertical alignment should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '13620', 'title': 'Bug 13620The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with large amount of white space', 'description': '', 'OB': "Bug 13620The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with large amount of white space TThe Java Source Attachment Preference Pagehas a leabel that sits in themiddle of the page with a huge amount of white space. It's verticalAlignmentshould be set to SWT.ALIGNBEGINNING.STEPS1) Load a project from the repository2) Select a source folder3) Open Properties4) Select Java Source Attachment5 [details]) You will get an info label in the middle of the dialog. ", 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
